description:
Prowlarr is an indexer manager/proxy built on the popular *arr .net/reactjs base stack to integrate with your various PVR apps.

Prowlarr supports management of both Torrent Trackers and Usenet Indexers.
It integrates seamlessly with Lidarr, Mylar3, Radarr, Readarr, and Sonarr offering complete management of your indexers with no per app Indexer setup required.
Changes:
- Pin ReportGenerator in Azure Pipelines for .NET 6
- Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
- Improve No Results Messaging
- Fixed: Updates Page Translations
- Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
- Fixed: (Torrent RSS) Clear old cookies on edit [ #2275 ]
- Check for disabled till value in filtering blocked providers
- Bump version to 1.26.1
- Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
- Update timezone offset for FL
- Fixed: (IPTorrents) Search IMDb ID in descriptions
- Fixed: (BeyondHD) Enforce length for API and RSS keys
- Fixed: NzbIndex removed, API not supported
- Update JetBrains logos
- Improve exception message for invalid torrent files
- Add Knaben as native indexer
- Fixed indexer names for no definitions check
- Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
- Cleaning paths for top level root folders
- Ignore extra spaces in path when not running on Windows
- Fixed getting parents from different OS paths
- Use OperatingSystem class to get OS information
- Inherit trigger from pushed command models
- Fix settings fetching failure for updates
- Fixed: Initial state for qBittorrent v5.0
- Trim directory separators in GetRelativePath
- Update check returns error if build older than 180 days
- Bump version to 1.26.0
